content:
TERM: LLM Response Interceptor

DEFINITION:
Post-LLM hook that triggers extraction → compression → integration, with confidence thresholds and dedup gates.

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
Post-LLM hook around llm_tool; triggers extract→compress→integrate with confidence and dedup gates.

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
Captured three compact rules from a long policy answer, persisting only high-confidence patterns.

CATEGORY: WorkflowPattern

RELATIONSHIPS:
type: Interceptor; enables: KnowledgeextractoR, ZeptopatterncompressoR, KnowledgegraphintegratoR; governed_by: VettingagenT, IarcompliancevettinG
